mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(product_name, product_code, price, stock_quantity, description, manufacturer, image_url) VALUES(#{productName}, #{productCode}, #{price}, #{stockQuantity}, #{description}, #{manufacturer}, #{imageUrl})
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET product_name = #{productName}, category = #{category}, price = #{price}, stock_quantity = #{stockQuantity}, description = #{description}, manufacturer = #{manufacturer}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, is_active = #{isActive} WHERE id = #{id}
